title: Dangerous Love
overview: When the Emperor of the Great Zhou was still young, the dynasty was controlled by the treacherous minister Wei Shang Zhi. Legend has it that Wei Shang Zhi was a ruthless and lustful man who married six wives, all of whom died on the night of their wedding. Bai Zhi, his seventh wife, married into the Marquis of Jingbei with trepidation, and thought she would not live more than a day, but found that the traitorous minister seemed to be different from the rumors...
